description: Detects the import of the specified file to the registry with regedit.exe. Author: Oddvar Moe, Sander Wiebing, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Imports Registry Key From a File
query: (((process.executable:*\\regedit.exe AND process.command_line:(*\ \/i\ * OR *.reg*)) AND (NOT (process.command_line:(*\ \/e\ * OR *\ \/a\ * OR *\ \/c\ *)))) AND (NOT (process.command_line:/:[^ \\\\]/)))
